DOC.brief_summary: Superselective IRA infusion of tirofiban may improve myocardial reperfusion and reduce bleeding complications in AMI patients.
DOC.brief_title: Impacts of Superselective Infarct-related Artery (IRA) Infusion of Tirofiban on Myocardial Reperfusion and Bleeding Complications in Acute Myocardial Infarction (AMI) Patients
DOC.criteria: STEMI patients chest pain for less than 12hr plan to PCI LM lesion stent thrombosis cardiac shock thrombocytopenia allergy to asprin
